title: How to create a paper which would get most citations - Quora

response.answer_text: One way to increasing the number of citations on your article is to make your research paper easily discoverable online. By optimizing your research content for popular search engines such as Google, you can drive viewership, utilization and citation counts for your research paper. Following are steps you can take to improve “search-ability” of your academic paper Identify important keywordsIncorporate keywords in your contentSelf-CiteShare content on social mediaPromote your article onlineYou can find the entire list of steps to increasing citation counts here.
There is already another question on Quora that closely related to this question— it is best to refer to that. My answer to that question: What can I do to get more people to cite my paper?
